metadata.Title: CVE-2015-2312 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Sandstorm Cap'n Proto before 0.4.1.1 and 0.5.x before 0.5.1.1 allows remotepeers to cause a denial of service (CPU and possibly general resourceconsumption) via a list with a large number of elements.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2312` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

capnproto - 0.5.3-2ubuntu1
libcapnp-0.5.3 - 0.5.3-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: capnproto package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.5.3-2ubuntu1').
